content:
ISimplexDatagramRouter Interface

Definition

Defines the interface required for processing messages from simplex datagram.

In this Article

[System.ServiceModel.ServiceContract(Namespace="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/05/routing", SessionMode=System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Allowed)]
public interface ISimplexDatagramRouter

Remarks

This contract has the following settings:

  • Sessions are allowed, but not required.

  • One way messages.

Methods

BeginProcessMessage(Message, AsyncCallback, Object)

Initiates the asynchronous processing of the message.

public IAsyncResult BeginProcessMessage (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
Parameters
message
Message

The message to be processed.

callback
AsyncCallback

An AsyncCallback delegate that is invoked when the message processing has completed.

state
Object

A user-defined state object that is passed to the callback procedure.

Returns
IAsyncResult

An IAsyncResult that can be used to poll or wait for results, or both; this value is also needed when invoking stem.ServiceModel.Routing.ISimplexDatagramRouter.EndProcessMessage*.

EndProcessMessage(IAsyncResult)

Finishes asynchronous execution of message processing.

public void EndProcessMessage (IAsyncResult result);
Parameters
result
IAsyncResult

The asynchronous result returned by the call to stem.ServiceModel.Routing.ISimplexDatagramRouter.BeginProcessMessage*.
